pages.title: Mutant Creeper
pages.text: $(br)Naturally spawned $(key)Creepers$() have a small chance to mutate into a $(key)Mutant Creeper$().$(br)They can also be spawned manually via $(mage/spell#summon)Mana Summon$() or a $(key)Splash Mutant Potion$().$(br2)Defeating a $(key)Mutant Creeper$() drops a $(key)Creeper Shard$(), which can be used to craft $(mage/spell#break)Remote Disintegration$().
